title: Attachment Repair
subtitle: From Insecure to Earned Secure
description: A 6-module course on understanding and healing your attachment patterns. Learn how attachment forms, identify your style, and develop the skills for secure relating.

modules.title: Understanding Attachment
modules.description: How attachment forms and why it matters

whatYouLearn: Understand how attachment patterns form in childhood
Identify your specific attachment style and triggers
Regulate attachment anxiety without seeking reassurance
Open intimacy blocks from avoidant patterns
Choose partners who support secure attachment
Develop earned secure attachment through practice
requirements: Willingness to examine relationship patterns honestly
Openness to changing how you relate

questions.question: When does attachment style primarily form?
options: In the first few years of life with primary caregivers

questions.question: What is the core fear in anxious attachment?
What is the core fear in avoidant attachment?
What is 'protest behavior' in attachment terms?
options: Actions to get a partner's attention when feeling disconnected

questions.question: What does 'earned secure' attachment mean?
options: Developing security through conscious work despite insecure childhood

questions.question: Why do people often choose partners with complementary insecure styles?
options: The dynamic feels familiar and confirms existing beliefs about relationships

questions.question: What is key to healing attachment wounds?
options: Consistent corrective experiences with safe others plus internal work
